extendedInfo.description: Zombie Swype is a zombie game where you swype chains of like zombies to kill them, gain points and advance in level. The more zombies that you kill in one chain, the more points. The sickle and chainsaw bonuses provide 2x and 3x multipliers to improve your zombie killing score. These bonuses can also be multiplied together to achieve some rather high scoring kills. If you like killing zombies you'll definitely enjoy this game!

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This game is fun and insanely addictive! If you could tho, make a personal high score board that\'d be fantastic!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Fun, Gets Boring.
reviews.comment: It\'s fun at first. But then gets boring.   You Post The Score(s), and then you have to CLICK BACK TO THE MENU! It\'s Annoying.  I Uninstalled it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Anytime you can add zombies to a game you are certain to have fun. I love the chainsaw reward. When I think about it...the only true defense from a zombie is a chainsaw. But Im speaking the obvious.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I Love this game
reviews.comment: Very addicting.... and love the sound effects... my kids 3,5,6 love to watch me play it... they like the zombies.... im sure it will take off soon with the downloads and ratings... A MUST HAVE FOR FREE TIME
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: I can\'t get enough of this game! I love it!!!

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Not a regular match 3 across game. Fun plus the music and slaying noises are good. Surprised not more downloads. I\'m sure it will take off soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very fun but...
reviews.comment: It force closes right when the time runs out. It could easily be addicting if it wasn\'t for this issue. On Nexus 7
